testcase.name: soap api TestCase1
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print responseHeaders ................................................... passed * print responseHeaders["Server"] ......................................... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"][0] == "Microsoft-IIS/7.5" ............... passed * match responseHeaders["Server"] == ["Microsoft-IIS/7.5"] ................ passed * print responseType == "xml" ............................................. passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response contains "98.6" .......................................... passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == 98.6 ...................... passed * print responseTime ...................................................... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed * print responseStatus .................................................... passed
